text: Collateralized debt obligations (CDOs) involve several parties. The following is a list of CDO managers and sponsors. http://www.mpzlaw.com/downloads/CDOARTICLEAPRIL12008.pdf A Primer on the ABCs of CDO litigation, New York Law Journal, Mark P Zimmett, 2008 4 1 Vol 239 No 62 CDO Due Diligence Q&A; IncreMental Advantage interview with Zachary D. Rosenbaum, 2007, via lowenstein.com, accessed 2010 4 14 Top CDO Managers Since 2001, Asset Backed Alert, abalert.com, date unknown. Via Internet Archive's archive.org, archived page from 2008 01 29. CDO Sponsors Since 2000, Commercial Mortgage Alert, cmalert.com, date unknown.
